CartSuccess.heading: Order confirmation
CartSuccess.paragraph: Congratulations! You payment was successfull, now its time for us to prepare your order and sent it to you as fast as we can. Check your email for more info abou your purchase.

CartRejected.heading: Payment rejected
CartRejected.paragraph: Oh no! Looks like your payment process didn't finish. Its either your decision or we encountered some technical issues. Please try again. If this problem repeats please contact our support team.

toast.unknownCredentials: This email/password combination doesn't exist in our database.

signUpForm.name: Write your name and surname divided by space
signUpForm.username: Alphanumeric, underscores or dash characters only
signUpForm.password: Please combine numbers, letters and special characters

NotFound.heading: Page not found
NotFound.text: Nothing found at this address. This page may have been moved or permanently deleted. Please double-check that this link is correct, go back or click below to return to the home page.
